name: Los Angeles Syndicate of Technology (LAST)
tag_list: venture, technology, startup, incubator, public, capital
overview:
Los Angeles Syndicate of Technology, Inc. (OTC: LAST) is a publicly traded Startup Incubator that builds web and mobile technology companies.

LAST develops businesses in digital media, consumer internet, and social networking, and owns six companies at different stages of development.

The unique LAST structure finally allows retail investors to access early stage venture capital. LAST’s diversified and professionally managed portfolio provides exciting dividend return potential along with the liquidity of a publicly traded stock.

LAST’s investment process begins with incubating ideas and seed financing the initial product. LAST then builds tailored management teams and help raise growth capital to launch each product into the market. LAST has made six investments to date and the portfolio is currently valued over $10 million.
